contentrichtext.text: {{eastons}} '''Abieezer''' is the name of three Biblical characters. The name means "father of help" i.e., helpful. The characters are: * The second of the three sons of Hammoleketh, the sister of Gilead. He was the grandson of [[Manasseh (tribal patriarch)|Manasseh]] ({{bibleverse|1|Chr|7:18}}). From his family [[Gideon]] sprang ({{bibleverse||Jos|17:2}}; {{bibleverse||Jud|6:34}}; {{bibleverse||Jud|8:2}}). He was also called Jeezer ({{bibleverse||Num|26:30}}). * One of David's thirty warriors ({{bibleverse|2|Samuel|23:27}}; {{bibleverse|1|Chr|27:12}}) a [[Benjamite]] from [[Anathoth]]. * The prince of the tribe of Dan at the [[The Exodus|Exodus]] ({{bibleverse||Num|1:12}}). [[Category:Hebrew Bible people]] {{Tanakh-stub}}
